mapper.insert: insert into comment ( content, user_id, created_date, entity_id, entity_type ) values ( #{content}, #{user_id}, #{created_date}, #{entity_id}, #{entity_type} )
mapper.update: update comment set content = #{content}, user_id = #{user_id}, created_date = #{created_date}, entity_id = #{entity_id}, entity_type = #{entity_type} where id=#{id}
